subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Bobby Parnell doesn’t have a remarkable physique. But somehow he can discharge lightning bolts out of his hand in the form of a baseball traveling over 102 miles per hour.
snippet: The Mets’ Bobby Parnell doesn’t have a remarkable physique. But somehow he can discharge lightning bolts out of his hand in the form of a baseball traveling over 102 miles per hour.
